['Increased  Death Pulse damage from 75/125/200/275 to 125/175/225/275.', ' Heartstopper Aura no longer affects ancient creeps.', ' Sadist\nIncreased health regeneration per stack from 1/2/3/4 to 1/2/3/6.\nIncreased mana regeneration per stack from 2/4/6/10 to 2/4/6/12.', 'Increased health regeneration per stack from 1/2/3/4 to 1/2/3/6.', 'Increased mana regeneration per stack from 2/4/6/10 to 2/4/6/12.']

[' Death Pulse no longer ignores invisible enemies and enemies in the Fog of War.']

[" Reaper's Scythe now always grants Necrophos the kill credit for that unit when it dies during it, regardless of who did the last hit.", " Aghanim's Scepter now also causes  Reaper's Scythe to disable the target hero's Buyback for that death, if it dies to or during Reaper's Scythe."]

['Now calculates and deals its damage at the end of the stun duration, instead of instantly upon cast. This means any damage or heal taken during the stun duration does affect the final damage.', 'Reduced stun duration from 1.5 to 1.', " Reaper's Scythe\nNow calculates and deals its damage at the end of the stun duration, instead of instantly upon cast.
